labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Australien', 'Großbritannien', 'Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika', 'Grundstoffe', 'Zyklische Konsumgüter & Dienstleistungen'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Australien', 'Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Australien', 'Niederlande', 'Schweiz', 'Grundstoffe', 'Telekommunikation Dienstleistungen'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Australien', 'Niederlande']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Japan', 'Spanien', 'Schweiz', 'Grundstoffe', 'ETFs'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Japan', 'Spanien', 'Schweiz', 'ETFs']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Deutschland', 'Schweden', 'Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika', 'Nicht-zyklische Konsumgüter & Dienstleistungen', 'Telekommunikation Dienstleistungen'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Deutschland', 'Schweden', 'Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Hongkong', 'Philippinen', 'Schweiz', 'ETFs', 'Technologie'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Hongkong', 'Philippinen', 'Schweiz', 'ETFs']
